comment.author: 41133925@N02
comment._content: this is the first. the Vickers airfield at the time was quite a way from the factory wich meant moving the aeroplanes across this bridge so they could take off.

comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content: Vickers B.9/32 (Wellington prototype) s/n K4049.  First flight June 15, 1936, crashed in April 1937
